Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build an control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The HtmlSelectBuilder control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control. Use the HtmlSelectBuilder control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom HtmlSelectBuilder control that defines two types of `<option>` child elements of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and then processes each type differently.
